definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: The fluorosilicon polymers with different vinyl contents were vulcanized by using of benzyl peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 用碘量法測定的乙烯基含量與理論值相符。

sentences.english: The main part is made from expanded polytetrafluoroethylene.
sentences.chinese: 主要部分，是由膨體聚四氟乙烯。

sentences.english: A novel two-phase model for the fluidized bed of polyethylene with condensed mode operation was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了氣相法聚乙烯冷凝模式操作反應器的兩相模型。

sentences.english: After harvest, the fruit treated with ethephon showed rapid increase in respiratory rate.
sentences.chinese: 採後用乙烯利處理的果實呼吸速率增加明顯。

sentences.english: In this paper, asymmetric microporous poly (vinylidene fluoride) (PVDF)membranes were prepared by phase-inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用相轉換法制備了聚偏氟乙烯不對稱微孔膜。

sentences.english: The process of polyvinyl butyral (PVB)was briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了聚乙烯醇縮丁醛生產的工藝流程。

sentences.english: PE Packer is used for paper box, paper case, color printing corporation, etc.
sentences.chinese: 聚乙烯自動打包機用於紙盒，紙箱彩色印刷公司。

sentences.english: It shows that the low-density polythene has better improved effects.
sentences.chinese: 低密度聚乙烯具有較好的改性效果。

sentences.english: Conductor screen is formed by extruded semi-conducting layer or wrapped with semi-conducting tapes and semi-conducting layer.
sentences.chinese: 絕緣採用超淨交聯聚乙烯絕緣料擠包在導體屏蔽上。

sentences.english: Objective To study the features of stilbene glycoside's stability.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究二苯乙烯苷體外穩定性的特徵。

sentences.english: Polymers of vinyl chloride or of other halogenated olefins, in primary forms.
sentences.chinese: 初級形狀的氯乙烯或其他鹵化烯烴聚合物。

sentences.english: Best result are obtained by shutting down on a non-TPU resin like polyethylene.
sentences.chinese: 最好的結果是停止使用非聚氨酯樹脂，如聚乙烯。

sentences.english: The grafting of acrylic acid onto a polyethylene film by the pre-irradiation method was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 採用預輻射法研究了丙烯酸對聚乙烯膜的接枝反應。

sentences.english: New low friction, non-stick PTFE sole reduces strain on hand.
sentences.chinese: 新的低摩擦，非唯一聚四氟乙烯棒訂單減少緊張。

sentences.english: A large body of evidence has demonstrated that ethylene is the hormone of catalyzing fruit ripening.
sentences.chinese: 大量研究證實，乙烯是躍變型成熟果實的催熟劑。

sentences.english: A preliminary study on change patterns of ethylene production during flower opening and senescence in cut roses (Chinese with English Abstract).
sentences.chinese: 月季切花開花和衰老進程中乙烯變化類型初探。
